pages.text: The Zombies you encounter every night wear lots of valuable equipment. But when they die, it disappears never to be seen again.$(br2)No problem if you manage to snatch it from them while they are still alive. Gotcha!

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Small chance for mobs (and other players!) to drop their equipment when hit.$(br2)Max Level: 2$(br)Applicable to melee weapons.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a $(item)common Book$() with Disarming by surrounding your $(l:enchanting/enchanter)Enchanter$() with $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() and the other required materials.

pages.title: Enchantment Upgrading
pages.text: Upgrading Disarming from level 1 to level 2 is fairly cheap at first.$(br)This price will quickly increase to more and more $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() and experience for each additional level.
